about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks a folder inside the game location that contains:

  • Behind the scenes.
  • Screenshots of under development builds of The Alien Cube compared to the final version.
  • Under-development video.
  • Wallpapers.

To access the DLC:
Right click the game in your Steam Library -> Manage -> Browse Local Files

Thank you for supporting the developer!
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks a folder inside the game location that contains:

To access the DLC:

Thank you for supporting the developer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 2GB/AMD RX 560 2GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
